segments.text: The entire setup screams potential catastrophe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water from the sink is flooding out uncontrollably.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's right there, but blind to it all.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her foot in the puddle, slip risk high.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes on the counter could topple too.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Now the boy, balanced precariously on that stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, he could fall hard.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Hand in the cookie jar, other holding a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's assisting, reaching up innocently.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Wet floor below, injury waiting to happen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Cabinets open, everything exposed to damage.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden calm, but inside panic looms.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I worry the mom will turn too late.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This could end in tears for everyone.
segments.speaker: PAR
